name: Zucchini Carpaccio
keywords: appetizer, lemon, olive oil, parmesan, zucchini, vegetarian

recipeInstructions.text: Peel 1 pound zucchini into ribbons with a vegetable peeler; spread them out on a platter.
Whisk together 1/4 cup olive oil and the juice of one lemon.
Drizzle over zucchini ribbons; season with salt and pepper, and scatter shaved Parmesan over the top.
